summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED SUDDEN ACCELERATION.   *DT   *JB   WHEN THE CONSUMER STOPPED IN THE DRIVEWAY, THE VEHICLE UNEXPECTEDLY ACCELERATED TO THE POINT THE BRAKES DID NOT STOP THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE HIT THE CONSUMER'S SON, WHO WAS STANDING IN THE GARAGE, THROUGH THE BACK WALL OF THE GARAGE AND HAD RUN HIM OVER.   *SCC  *JB *CB
